description: This file defines the server-side rendering logic for a Remix application, handling HTTP requests, differentiating between bot and browser requests, and streaming HTML responses.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main request handler that processes incoming HTTP requests, sets CORS headers, and delegates to bot or browser-specific handlers based on user-agent detection.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for bots by streaming the application shell as HTML.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for browsers by streaming the application shell as HTML.
